pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering with Compositional Data // Cluster analysis with compositional data using the alpha--transformation. Relevant papers include: Tsagris M. and Kontemeniotis N. (2025), doi:10.48550/arXiv.2509.05945. Tsagris M.T., Preston S. and Wood A.T.A. (2011), doi:10.48550/arXiv.1106.1451. Garcia- Escudero Luis A., Gordaliza Alfonso, Matran Carlos, Mayo-Iscar Agustin. (2008), doi:10.1214/07-AOS515.
